references.logic_excerpt: IF India is selected in previous field then Values is DOM IN, If international is selected then value is INT

conditions.when: Select the process type = India
Select the process type = International

references.logic_excerpt: Dropdown values will come based on the account group/vendor type selection field as 2nd column of reference table 1.3

conditions.when: Account Group/Vendor Type is selected
conditions.then: Filter Group key/Corporate Group dropdown based on selection

references.logic_excerpt: If account group/vendor type is selected as ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE (any one) then derived it as Domestic. If Account group/vendor type is selected as ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS (any one) then derived it as import

conditions.when: Account Group/Vendor Type IN [ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE]
Account Group/Vendor Type IN [ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS]

references.logic_excerpt: If the Select the process type field value is India then country is India and Noneditable, If Select the process type field value is international then country is selectable dropdown

conditions.when: Select the process type = India
Select the process type = International
conditions.then: Country is selectable dropdown from reference table 1.1

references.logic_excerpt: If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 5 on table 1.1

conditions.then: Derive Country Name from table 1.1 column 5

references.logic_excerpt: If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 2 on table 1.1

conditions.when: Country is selected
conditions.then: Derive Country Code from table 1.1 column 2

references.logic_excerpt: Dropdown values will come from column 3 based on process type filter (DOM IN or INT) as column 1 of reference table 1.2

conditions.when: Process Type = DOM IN
conditions.then: Filter Company Code dropdown by DOM IN from table 1.2

conditions.when: Process Type = INT
conditions.then: Filter Company Code dropdown by INT from table 1.2

intra_panel_references.logic_text: If "Yes" then TDS certificate upload field is mandatory. If "No", field will be hidden. Upload size is 15 Mb

If ID Type is ZCUCIN then its Mandatory. Duplicate of the CIN field, as the Pixilate team is using the same field in SAP to capture CIN. We will hide the CIN Panel if the criteria of ZCUCIN/C are not met

extracted_rule.purpose: SAP integration - same field used to capture CIN

reference_details.raw_expression: If yes, Vendor will upload MSME Certificate and OCR will be performed post upload. Upload size is 15Mb
If no, Vendor will upload MSME Declaration (Not Mandatory)
